customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product (Panasonic RA41660 Electric Thermo Pot Water Boiler Dispenser) 4 months ago and after a month I noticed rust on the lid. My attempts to clean off the rust were unsuccessful. The problem continued to get worse and spread to the backside of the lid and even to the white plastic area. I contacted Panasonic hoping they could send me a replacement lid. The company has done nothing. I am very disappointed in Panasonic customer service and product quality. ` I finally contacted Amazon who stepped-in and issued my a partial refund. I'm in the process of trying to get a full refund of my purchase.

product_meta.title: Panasonic RA41660 Electric Thermo Pot Water Boiler Dispenser NC-EG3000, Slow-Drip Mode for Coffee, Ideal for Tea, Hot Cocoa, Soups and Baby Food, Four TEM, 3.2 quarts, White
product_meta.description: Size:3.2 quartsWhether hosting a business meeting, catering an event, or simply upping the convenience quota of everyday life, The Panasonic electric thermo pot hot water boiler dispenser NC-EG3000 makes it easy to quickly and safely boil and dispense hot water.
